div.p: I'm majoring in Theology with a minor in Philosophy.
After running a business for 12 years the last thing I wanted to do was
to have anything to do with business.
Actually a lot of the reason I wanted to get away from my business was
that I became more involved in theology and religion.
So it came at the perfect time.
Once my business stopped I found myself sitting in the ACCESS office.
I really don't know how it happened.
It just kind of happened --there I was and it was simple.
The next thing I knew within a month or so I was in the program.
I'm a sophomore now I'll be a junior in the winter.
